title: Inflation rate in Germany 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.

The line drastically decreased by 16.0 times from Year 1985 to 1986,increased by 1.8 times from Year 1986 to 1987,increased by 5.3 times from Year 1987 to 1988,increased by 2.2 times from Year 1988 to 1989,increased by 2.1 times from Year 1999 to 2000,decreased by 11.0 times from Year 2008 to 2009,increased by 4.5 times from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 2.2 times from Year 2010 to 2011, and lastly, increased by 4.5 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 5.05 was reached at Year 1992
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.13 was reported at Year 1986
